name: Wavelength
title: wavelength.zone
shortDescription: Wavelength is a party game that challenges players to sync up their thinking. Participants guess where a clue fits on a spectrum, such as 'hot or cold' or 'soft or hard'. It's designed for group entertainment, making it ideal for social gatherings or game nights. Originally a tabletop game, it features a physical component that enhances the gaming experience.
pros: Quick setup and easy to play
Physical component adds to the fun
cons: Physical game may not be portable
